蒓字的基本解释

蒓
chún
见“莼”。

蒓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chún］
［《廣韻》常倫切，平諄，禪。］
“莼1”的繁体字。
多年生水草。叶片橢圆形，深绿色，浮在水面，茎上和叶背有黏液，花暗红色。嫩叶可以做汤菜。

蒓字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蒓； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1048第04
【唐韻】常倫切，音純。水葵也。【集韻】通作蓴。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chún］
["Guangyun" Chang Lunqie, flat and simple, Zen. ]
Traditional characters for "莼1".
Perennial aquatic plants. The leaves are oval, dark green, floating on the water, mucus on the stem and back of the leaves, and dark red flowers. The young leaves can be used as soup dishes.
蒓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　蒓; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1048 Page 04
[Tang Yun] Chang Lun cut, pure sound. Water sunflower also. 【Jiyun】Through as Ulva.
